001package com.technototes.library.logger.entry;
002
003import java.util.function.Supplier;
004
005import com.technototes.library.util.Color;
006
007/** The root class for logging entries
008 * @author Alex Stedman
009 *
010 * @param <T> The type of value being stored by the entry
011 */
012public abstract class Entry<T> implements Supplier<T> {
013
014    protected int x;
015    protected int priority;
016    protected Supplier<T> supplier;
017    protected String name;
018    protected String tag;
019    protected Color color;
020
021    public Entry(String n, Supplier<T> s, int index, Color c) {
022        x = index;
023        supplier = s;
024        name = n;
025        color = c;
026        tag = (name.equals("") ? " " : color.format(name) + " ` ");
027    }
028
029    public Entry<T> setPriority(int p) {
030        priority = p;
031        return this;
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public T get() {
036        return supplier.get();
037    }
038
039    /** The String for the logged item
040     *
041     * @return The String
042     */
043    @Override
044    public String toString() {
045        return supplier.get().toString();
046    }
047
048    /** The tag for the entry
049     *
050     * @return The tag
051     */
052    public String getTag() {
053        return tag;
054    }
055
056    /** Get the name (unformatted tag)
057     *
058     * @return The name
059     */
060    public String getName() {
061        return name;
062    }
063
064    /** Get the index for the entry
065     *
066     * @return The index
067     */
068    public int getIndex() {
069        return x;
070    }
071
072    /** Set index
073     *
074     * @param i New index
075     * @return this
076     */
077    public Entry setIndex(int i) {
078        x = i;
079        return this;
080    }
081
082    /** Get Priority for the entry
083     * @return The priority
084     */
085    public int getPriority() {
086        return priority;
087    }
088}
